name: Disciple Mastery Slate
description: Struck to recognize your achievement in reaching the rank of 7 - Disciple.

languages.description: Geschaffen, um dein Erreichen von Rang 7 - Jünger zu ehren.
languages.name: Meisterschaft-Insignie: Jünger

languages.description: Gravée pour commémorer votre réussite en atteignant le Palier 7 - Disciple.
languages.name: Ardoise de Maîtrise - Disciple

languages.description: Coniata per riconoscere il tuo successo nel raggiungere il grado 7 - Discepolo.
languages.name: Targa Maestria - Discepolo

languages.description: 랭크 7 - 디사이플에 도달한 업적을 기리기 위한 표창패입니다.
languages.name: 디사이플 마스터리 슬레이트

languages.description: Impresionado por reconocer tu logro al alcanzar el rango de 7 - Discípulo.
languages.name: Placa de Maestría de Discípulo

languages.description: 为表彰你成功达到段位 7－门徒所打造的物品。
languages.name: 门徒精通石板

languages.description: ディサイプルランク「マスタリーランク7」へ到達したテンノの成果を示す表彰楯。
languages.name: ディサイプル マスタリー 表彰楯

languages.description: Stworzona, by upamiętnić Twój wyczyn w osiągnięciu rangi 7 - Uczeń.
languages.name: Tablica Mistrzostwa Uczeń

languages.description: Concedida em reconhecimento à sua conquista por alcançar o nível 7 - Discípulo.
languages.name: Ardósia de Maestria: Discípulo

languages.description: 篆刻來認可你達成精通段位 7－門徒的成就。
languages.name: 門徒精段匾

languages.description: ประทับตรารับรู้ถึงความสำเร็จของคุณในการไปถึงอันดับ 7 - ลูกศิษย์
languages.name: กระดานชนวนความเชี่ยวชาญ: ลูกศิษย์

languages.description: Seviye 7 - Öğrenci seviyesine ulaşma başarını anmak için oluşturulmuştur.
languages.name: Öğrenci Ustalık Levhası
